parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the ACK cluster.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The name of the ECS instance. If you set the ClusterType parameter to ecs, you must configure this parameter.

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description: The type of the monitoring object. Valid values: ask and ecs.

parameters.name: GrafanaInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Grafana workspace used by the ASK cluster or ECS instance. If you set the value to free or leave the parameter empty, a shared Grafana workspace is used.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the Prometheus instance belongs.

parameters.name: SecurityGroupId
parameters.description: The security group of the ASK cluster or ECS instance.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The vSwitch used by the ASK cluster or ECS instance.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The virtual private cloud (VPC) where the ASK cluster or ECS instance resides.
